scripts.docker-build: cd docker && docker-compose build app && docker-compose build
scripts.blueboard-pkg: cd docker && docker-compose up -d && docker exec -t llgapp-app composer update && docker-compose down --volumes -t 0
scripts.blueboard-migrate: cd docker && docker-compose up -d && docker exec -t llgapp-app php artisan migrate && docker-compose down --volumes -t 0
scripts.blueboard-keygen: cd docker && docker-compose up -d && docker exec -t llgapp-app php artisan key:generate && docker-compose down --volumes -t 0
